## Icon.setIconLocation() method

Notification that the icon has moved. Update the arrow accordingly.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
setIconLocation(xy: Coordinate): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  xy | [Coordinate](./blockly.utils_namespace.coordinate_class.md) | Absolute location in workspace coordinates. |
